sentences.en: Both have fudged their calculations and avoided specifics.
sentences.cn: 两人都对自己的计算结果含糊其词，避免提到具体数字。

sentences.en: Do not disclose the specifics of the project.
sentences.cn: 不要给他们透露项目的细节.

sentences.en: Gravel root is specifics for dissolving kidney stones and renal calculi.
sentences.cn: 粉绿茎泽兰根部可分解肾结石及尿砂.

sentences.en: He never talked in specifics about his work.
sentences.cn: 他从不谈论有关自己工作的详情.

sentences.en: He speaks in concepts rather than specifics.
sentences.cn: 他讲话时尽用抽象概念,而不谈具体.

sentences.en: I am talking in a general terms and not referring to specifics.
sentences.cn: 我这只是泛论,并非特指.

sentences.en: I told him that we could talk specifics.
sentences.cn: 我对他说我们可以讨论具体问题.

sentences.en: My hands were tied. I could not talk in specifics or generalities.
sentences.cn: 我的手脚给束缚住了.我既不能具体地谈,也不能笼统地说.

sentences.en: No specifics, no strict rules on organization, so just write.
sentences.cn: 而且没什么具体要求, 照自己的想法写就行.

sentences.en: She refused to go into x specifics on Meet the Press.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝在《面对媒体》节目中谈及细节.

sentences.en: Things improved when we got down to the specifics.
sentences.cn: 当我们深入到具体细节时，情况有所改观。

sentences.en: Unfortunately the treaty is full of generalities, and fails to get down to specifics.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是条约很笼统,订得不具体.

sentences.en: Union officials won't discuss specifics of the negotiations.
sentences.cn: 工会官员们不会讨论谈判的细节。

sentences.en: What are the specifics of this arrangement?

phrases.tran_cn: 特殊请求；详细而具体的请求
比表面；比表面积；表面系数

trans.tran_cn: 详情，细节，特性，特效药( specific的名词复数)，特定之物
trans.tran_en: The specifics of a subject are the details of it that need to be considered
